item.title: time machine editor, pour faire les backups seulement quand vous ne travaillez pas
item.dc:creator: Karim Cassam ChenaÃ¯
item.content:encoded:
TimeMachineEditor is a software for Mac OS X 10.5 Leopard and Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard that lets you change the default one-hour backup interval of Time Machine.

http://timesoftware.free.fr/timemachineeditor/
item.excerpt:encoded: TimeMachineEditor is a software for Mac OS X 10.5 Leopard and Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard that lets you change the default one-hour backup interval of Time Machine. http://timesoftware.free.fr/timemachineeditor/
